duties_responsibilities.duty: Execute material logistics including shipping/receiving, storage, distribution, and cycle counting in a data center environment.
Demonstrate leadership and act as a point of contact during shift assignments.
Participate in the development and implementation of goals, objectives, policies, and priorities of the organization.
Manage and supervise hourly logistics personnel for assigned operations.
Oversee work plan for assigned staff within the area and conduct reviews.
Support data center operations including receiving, storing, and shipping materials with strict inventory control.
Ensure accurate and timely shipments and receipts receiving and maintain accurate records and metrics.
Assist in monthly and/or annual physical inventories and provide inventory reports.
Identify, document, and implement opportunities for continuous improvement.
Maintain a strong working knowledge of operating systems pertaining to the work area and participate in order planning for facilities team.
Manage tasks and vendor inventory orders, and participate in inventory audits.
Support OFCI (Construction Bulk Inventory) coordinator with 3-way match receiving and assist with bulk and asset receiving when necessary.
